lead_paragraph: Tim Clark broke a logjam at the Stanford St. Jude Championship in Memphis and grabbed the lead for himself. On a day that started with six players tied for the lead, Clark finished a bogey-free six-under-par 64 with three birdies and an eagle on his final five holes. He leads by two strokes as he looks for his first PGA Tour victory.
